```
     when this sprite clicked
      change [count v] by (1)
      say (count) for (1) seconds 
    ```

```
     when this sprite clicked
      set [count v] to (0) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      forever
      point towards (mouse-pointer v)
      move (5) steps 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      forever
      if <touching (Hedgehog v) ?> then
      change [score v] by (1)
      go to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set [score v] to (0)
      forever
      point towards (mouse-pointer v)
      move (5) steps 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set [score v] to (0)
      switch backdrop to (backdrop1 v)
      forever
      point towards (mouse-pointer v)
      move (5) steps 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      forever
      if <touching (Hedgehog v) ?> then
      change [score v] by (1)
      if <(score) = (10)> then
      switch backdrop to (Win v)
      stop [all v]
      end
      go to (random position v) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      forever
      change y by (-5)
      if <touching color [#663600] ?> then
      stop [all v] 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set [speed v] to (0)
      forever
      change y by (speed)
      change [speed v] by (-1)
      if <touching color [#663600] ?> then
      stop [all v] 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      set [speed v] to (0)
      forever
      change y by (speed)
      change [speed v] by (-1)
      if <touching color [#663600] ?> then
      set [speed v] to ((speed) * (-1)) 
    ```

```
     if <touching color [#663600] ?> then
      set [speed v] to (((speed) * (-1)) - (2)) 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      forever
      set size to (air) % 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (0) y: (0)
      point in direction (90)
      forever
      move (10) steps
      turn right (15) degrees 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (0) y: (0)
      point in direction (90)
      erase all
      pen down
      forever
      move (10) steps
      turn right (15) degrees
      wait (0.05) seconds 
    ```

```
     when green flag clicked
      go to x: (0) y: (0)
      point in direction (90)
      erase all
      pen down
      set [steps v] to (0)
      forever
      move (steps) steps
      change [steps v] by (0.5)
      turn right (15) degrees
      wait (0.05) seconds 
    ```
